title: Global papaya production 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Million metric tons has rose over the Year.
Million metric tons is roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, and finally slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Million metric tons, about 12.36 was reported at Year 2013
Minimum Million metric tons about 10.73 was reached at Year 2009
